description: Shivers Media, LLC was created for the purpose of developing software which uses the internet and blockchain technology to deliver horror films. Along with our distribution platform, we are also using our token sale to create a fund for creating a slate of unique and exclusive horror films as a way to attract users to our platform. The Shivers Token is to be used as a key to unlock products developed by the company. These products include Horror Films, Digital Media, and Software.
name: Shivers
